sections.title: Express
sections.placeholder: Let it all out. Raw, unfiltered, true feelings. No judgment, no editing, just release.

onStart.message: This is your safe space. Let it all out - no filters, no judgment 💜

onComplete.message: Thank you for your honesty. That took courage 🌊

sections.title: Examine
sections.placeholder: Explore the roots by asking yourself the hard questions.

suggested_questions: What triggered this feeling or response?
What old pattern am I repeating?
What unmet need is driving this?
Where is the shame or fear hiding?
What would I tell a friend in this situation?
What am I afraid will happen if I let this go?
What story am I telling myself about this?

onStart.message: Now let's go deeper. Ask yourself the hard questions 🔍

onComplete.message: This self-examination is profound. You're uncovering truth 💎

hints: Be gentle but honest with yourself
Look for patterns from your past
What would your wisest self say?
Where does this really come from?

3.message: You're asking the right questions! This is how we grow! 🌱

5.message: Five deep questions! You're committed to understanding! 💪

sections.title: Evolve
sections.placeholder: Create the change. Design new responses, reframe your perspective, set actionable steps, and identify your growth edge.

onStart.message: Now for the transformation! How will you evolve from this? 🦋

onComplete.message: YES! This is growth in action! You're evolving! 🚀

hints: What's one small step you can take today?
How will you respond differently next time?
What new story will you tell yourself?
What support or resources do you need?
How will you know you're making progress?
